results.title: Statin Therapy and Flow-Mediated Dilation: A Systematic Review and Dose-Response Meta-Analysis Using the GRADE of Data from Randomized Controlled Trials.
results.text_hl: Non-linear dose-response analysis revealed the most significant improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@FMD@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ at a dose of 20 mg/day and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at 80 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Arabi SM, Chambari M, Bahrami LS, Hadi S, Sahebkar A. Statin Therapy and Flow-Mediated Dilation: A Systematic Review and Dose-Response Meta-Analysis Using the GRADE of Data from Randomized Controlled Trials. Curr Hypertens Rev. 2024 Feb 21;():. PMID: 38385489
citations.BibTeX: @article{38385489, title={Statin Therapy and Flow-Mediated Dilation: A Systematic Review and Dose-Response Meta-Analysis Using the GRADE of Data from Randomized Controlled Trials.}, author={Arabi SM and Chambari M and Bahrami LS and Hadi S and Sahebkar A}, journal={Curr Hypertens Rev}}

results.title: Short- and long-term influence of diet and simvastatin on brachial artery endothelial function.
results.text_hl: Twelve months @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment, however, significantly improved @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@EDD@@@ by 32.7% (4.9% vs. 6.5%, p=0.007).

citations.NLM: Jensen LO, Thayssen P, Pedersen KE, Haghfelt T. Short- and long-term influence of diet and simvastatin on brachial artery endothelial function. Int J Cardiol. 2006 Feb 8;107(1):101-6. PMID: 16337504
citations.BibTeX: @article{16337504, title={Short- and long-term influence of diet and simvastatin on brachial artery endothelial function.}, author={Jensen LO and Thayssen P and Pedersen KE and Haghfelt T}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={107}, number={1}, pages={101-6}}

results.title: Efficacy of simvastatin in reducing aortic dilatation in mouse models of abdominal aortic aneurysm.
results.text_hl: Efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in reducing @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@aortic dilatation@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@abdominal aortic aneurysm@@@.

citations.NLM: Golledge J, Cullen B, Moran C, Rush C. Efficacy of simvastatin in reducing aortic dilatation in mouse models of abdominal aortic aneurysm. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 2010 Dec;24(5-6):373-8. PMID: 20809215

results.title: Short-term statin therapy improves cardiac function and symptoms in patients with idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: One group received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (n=24), and the other group received placebo (n=27).

citations.NLM: Node K, Fujita M, Kitakaze M, Hori M, Liao JK. Short-term statin therapy improves cardiac function and symptoms in patients with idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy. Circulation. 2003 Aug 19;108(7):839-43. PMID: 12885745

results.title: [Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with non-ischemic dilated cardiomyopathy].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To explore the effect of early statin therapy (@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) on mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Nonsyndromic_Holoprosencephaly @DISEASE_MESH:C580335 @@@non@@@-@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Li X, Liu XP, Liu XH, Du X, Kang JP, Lü Q, Wang HY, Xu X, Liang C, Yan Q, Lei T, Geng LL, Liu BQ, Ma CS. [Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with non-ischemic dilated cardiomyopathy]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2010 Jul 27;90(28):1974-7. PMID: 20979862

results.title: Increased inflammatory response in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy is associated with dyslipidemia: Effects of statin therapy.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@Dilated cardiomyopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@DCM@@@) is associated with increased @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response reflected among other markers in high-sensitivity @GENE_CRP @GENE_1401 @@@C-reactive protein@@@ (hsCRP) and soluble interleukin-2 receptor (sIL-2R) levels.

citations.NLM: Iakovis P, Anyfantakis ZA, Limas C, Kroupis C, Degiannis D, Cokkinos DV. Increased inflammatory response in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy is associated with dyslipidemia: Effects of statin therapy. Angiology. 2011 Jan;62(1):55-61. PMID: 21134995

results.title: Preservation of NO production by statins in the treatment of heart failure.
results.text_hl: Using Western blotting, there was a reduction in @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_403784 @@@eNOS@@@ protein during @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@ that was preserved at 4-5 weeks of pacing during treatment with SIMVA. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ maintained NO production by coronary vessels and NO bioactivity during pacing-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Trochu JN, Mital S, Zhang Xp, Xu X, Ochoa M, Liao JK, Recchia FA, Hintze TH. Preservation of NO production by statins in the treatment of heart failure. Cardiovasc Res. 2003 Nov 1;60(2):250-8. PMID: 14613854
